actions.description: The assassin makes two Shadow Blade attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) necrotic damage. Unless the target is immune to necrotic damage, the target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4 each time it is hit by this attack. The target dies if its Strength is reduced to 0. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest. If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.
actions.name: Shadow Blade

conditionImmunities: exhaustion, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
name: Shadow Assassin
resistances: acid, cold, fire, lightning, thunder; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: The assassin can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
specialTraits.name: Amorphous

specialTraits.description: While in dim light or darkness, the assassin can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
specialTraits.name: Shadow Stealth

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the assassin has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Weakness
